alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 2:25PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Sanders and southwestern Flathead Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 225 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 23 miles north of Plains, or 28 miles northeast of Thompson Falls, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs, Lonepine and Niarada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region
